description: McKay-Thompson series of class 23A for Monster.
comments: Also, McKay-Thompson series of class 23B for Monster. - _Michel Marcus_, Feb 18 2014
links: D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, 5175-5193 (1994).
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
mathematica: nmax = 50; QP = QPochhammer; s = -x + Sum[x^(2*j^2 + j*k + 3*k^2), {j, -nmax, nmax}, {k, -nmax, nmax}]/(QP[x]*QP[x^23]) + O[x]^nmax; CoefficientList[s, x] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 15 2015, adapted from g.f. in A134781 *)
crossrefs: Cf. A134781 (same sequence except for n=0).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 27 2000
